sai, nu dags naseinais.
2COR 6.3 ni ainhun in waihtai gibandans bistugqe, ei ni anawammjaidau andbahti unsar;

2COR 6.4 ak in allamma ustaiknjandans uns swe gudis andbahtos in stiwitja managamma, in aglom, in nauþim, in aggwiþom, 2COR 6.5 in slahim, in karkarom, in unsutjam, in arbaidim, in wokainim, in lausqiþrein, 2COR 6.6 in swikniþai, in kunþja, in laggamodein, in selein, in ahmin weihamma, in frijaþwai unhindarweisai, 2COR 6.7 in waurda sunjos, in mahtai gudis,
þairh wepna garaihteins taihswona jah hleidumona, 2COR 6.8 jah þairh wulþu jah unswerein, þairh wajamerein jah wailamerein,

swe airzjandans jah sunjeinai, swe unkunþai jah ufkunnaidai, 2COR 6.9 swe gaswiltandans jah sai libam, swe talzidai jah ni afdauþidai, 2COR 6.10 swe saurgandans, iþ sinteino faginondans, swe unledai, iþ managans gabigjandans, swe ni waiht aihandans jah allata disnimandans.
2COR 6.11 munþs unsar usluknoda du izwis,
Kaurinþius, hairto unsar urrumnoda.
2COR 6.12 ni þreihanda jus in uns, iþ þreihanda in hairþram izwaraim.
2COR 6.13 aþþan þata samo andalauni, swe frastim qiþa, urrumnaiþ jah jus.
2COR 6.14 ni wairþaiþ gajukans ungalaubjandam;
unte ƕo dailo garaihtein miþ ungaraihtein aiþþau ƕo gamainduþe liuhada miþ riqiza?
2COR 6.15 ƕo-uþ-þan samaqisse Xristau miþ Bailiama aiþþau ƕo daile galaubjandin miþ ungalaubjandin?
2COR 6.16 ƕo-uþ-þan samaqisse alhs gudis miþ galiugam?
unte jus alhs gudis siuþ libandins;
qiþiþ auk guþ: þatei
baua in im jah inna gagga jah wairþa ize guþ jah eis wairþand mis managei.
2COR 6.17 in-uþ-þis usgaggiþ us midumai ize jah afskaidiþ izwis, qiþiþ frauja, jah unhrainjamma ni attekaiþ,
jah ik andnima izwis 2COR 6.18 jah wairþa izwis du attin jah jus wairþiþ mis du sunum jah dauhtrum,
qiþiþ frauja allwaldands.
2COR 7.1 þo habandans nu gahaita, liubans, hrainjam unsis af allamma bisauleino leikis jah ahmins, ustiuhandans weihiþa in agisa gudis.
2COR 7.2 gamoteima in izwis;
ni ainummehun gaskoþum,
ni ainnohun frawardidedum,
ni ainnohun bifaihodedum.
2COR 7.3 ni du gawargeinai qiþa;
fauraqaþ auk þatei in hairtam unsaraim sijuþ du miþgaswiltan jassamana liban.
2COR 7.4 managa mis trauains du izwis,
managa mis ƕoftuli faur izwis,
usfulliþs im gaþlaihtais,
ufarfulliþs im fahedais in allaizos managons aglons unsaraizos.
2COR 7.5 jah auk qimandam unsis in Makaidonjai ni waiht habaida gaƕeilainais leik unsar, ak in allamma anapragganai,
utana waihjons,
innana agisa.
2COR 7.6 akei sa gaþlaihands hnaiwidaim gaþrafstida uns guþ in quma Teitaus;
2COR 7.7 aþþan ni þatainei in quma is, ak jah in gaþlaihtai, þizaiei gaþrafstiþs was ana izwis, gateihands uns izwara gairnein, izwarana gaunoþu, izwar aljan faur mik, swaei mis mais faginon warþ.

2COR 7.8 unte jabai gaurida izwis in bokom, ni idreigo mik, jah jabai idreigoda— unte gasaiƕa þatei so aipistaule jaina, jabai jah du leitilai ƕeilai, gaurida izwis— 2COR 7.9 nu fagino, ni unte gauridai wesuþ, ak unte gauridai wesuþ du idreigai;
saurgaideduþ auk bi guþ, ei waihtai ni gasleiþjaindau us unsis.
2COR 7.10 unte bi guþ saurga idreiga du ganistai gatulgida ustiuhada;
iþ þis fairƕaus saurga dauþu gasmiþoþ.
2COR 7.11 saiƕ auk silbo þata bi guþ saurgan izwis, ƕelauda gatawida izwis usdaudein, akei sunjon, akei unwerein, akei agis, akei gairnein, akei aljan, akei fraweit!
in allamma ustaiknideduþ izwis hlutrans wisan þamma toja.
2COR 7.12 aþþan jabai melida, ni in þis anamahtjandins, ni in þis anamahtidins, ak du gabairhtjan usdaudein unsara þoei faur izwis habam wiþra izwis in andwairþja gudis.
2COR 7.13 in-uþ-þis gaþrafstidai sijum;
aþþan ana gaþrafsteinai unsarai filaus mais faginodedum ana fahedai Teitaus, unte anaƕeilaiþs warþ ahma is fram allaim izwis.
